name: Tiny trouble in Suez
description:
Hello, this is a small game that we've cooked together with @thoughtt over the weekend for #194 Weekly Gamejam! #TinyBoat 

Your goal as a tugboat operator is to help that bigass container ship with passing the canal, beware of strong winds and other vessels. Controls are explained in-game. Cheers!

Credits:
Programming & design :  @StormKiller
Art&Ui : @thoughtt

Satellite images courtesy of GoogleEarth. Special thanks to the Twitter folks for great memes and good laughs.
